products.title: Hazel Perfect Fit
products.description: A dark brown shade, the hazel25mm perfect fit blind willbe the final part of your interior jigsaw. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.description: Enjoy a classic tone in your window with the soho brown pleated dimout perfect fit. The fabric itself is not a dull one-tone, but is instead built up from overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and vivid colour. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, further enlivening this exciting blind.

products.title: Cellular Blackout Chocolate Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.
